## Description {#details}

Base class for ilist nodes.

Optionally tracks whether this node is the sentinel.

Definition at line 65 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/ilist-node-base-h">ilist&#95;node&#95;base.h</a>.
